Articles.Content: So, yeah. New to the forums. Been playing KSP for a month or so, after watching a lot of HOCgaming's and Scott Manley's videos. No mods so far, but might start using some of them in the future. Currently looking into the kethane pack to add a bit more purpose to the moon base that I've recently started building. See you around!
Welcome to the forums! Glad to see your missions are going well. If you need any help, don't hesitate to ask, everyone is real friendly around here.
